title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a separate pan, fry pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, pecorino cheese, salt, and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture to coat the spaghetti. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs and create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and sliced onions, sauté until fragrant.
Add sliced chicken breasts, cook until browned.
Add sliced bell peppers, continue to cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in vanilla extract and eggs, one at a time.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually add to the creamed mixture.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
